Overview Chapter

class CGOBManager

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBManagerGlobal manager.
~CGOBManager
Operations
ActivateModal Activate a modal widget.
ActivatePopup Activate a popup menu widget.
AddFont
BroadcastMsg Send a message to all widgets, recursively.
CaptureMouse
DeActivateModal Disables the modal widget.
Execute Manager handler to be called every cycle.
GetClip
GetEvent
GetRedrawRate
GetScreenPtr
GetSurfacePtr
GetTimeStamp
Init Initialize Goblin manager with screen, drawing surface, and clipping rectangle.
IsInited
IsMouseCaptured
Prim2D
ReleaseMouse
SetClip
SetEvent
SetRedrawRate CDXBitmapFont for all text output.
SetToolTipWidget Set the tooltip widget associated with the manager.
SetWorkspaceColor
Shutdown
ActivateToolTip Our OnDraw function to draw the workspace.
DisplayManagerInfo The following is for debug infomation for the developers.
InitColorSystem Handle to DC of workspace.
gprintf Manager infomation.
Overridables
OnDraw Our workspace image parameters, 'Center, Tiled, etc.
Data Members
public
BOOL IsRedrawn;
CDXFont* m_Font [ 10 ];CDXBitmapFont for all text output. No alternative at the moment.
CGOBWidget* m_pFocusObject;
CGOBWidget* m_pKeyboardObject;
CGOBWidget* m_pLastMouseObject;
CGOBWidget* m_pModalObject;
CGOBWidget* m_pMouseObject;CGOBWidget *m_CurrentObject;
private
RECT m_ClipRect;Our clipping rect of the workspace.
int m_EventID;Global event ID sent by any other object.
HDC m_HDC;Handle to DC of workspace. Steering away from needing this.
BOOL m_IsInited;Flag specifies if manager has been initialied.
BOOL m_IsMouseCaptured;Flag specifies if mouse is captured by a specific widget.
BOOL m_IsPopupActive;Flag specifies if popup menu is active at the moment.
BOOL m_IsToolTipActive;Flag specifies if tool tip is currently active.
AnimObj m_WorkspaceAnimObj;The following is for the workspace display and processing. Workspace AnimObj to handle scrolling background.
DWORD m_WorkspaceColor;Our workspace color in RGB.
int m_WorkspaceXOff;X pixel offset of workspace image.
int m_WorkspaceYOff;Y pixel offset of workspace image.
DWORD m_dwLastRedrawTime;Last redraw time.
DWORD m_dwRedrawDelay;Redraw delay in milliseconds.
DWORD m_dwStartTime;In ms.
DWORD m_dwTimeStamp;Time in MS when this drawing frame started.
DWORD m_dwToolTipDelay;Tool tip activation delay.
DWORD m_dwToolTipTimer;Internal timer for tool tip.
DWORD m_dwWorkspaceImageParms;Our workspace image parameters, 'Center, Tiled, etc.'.
CDXSurface* m_pCDXDrawSurface;
CDXScreen* m_pCDXScreen;CDXScreen pointer.
CGOBWidget* m_pCapturedWidget;Points to widget that has mouse capture.
CGOBPopMenu* m_pPopupWidget;Popup menu widget. Points to user create popup widget.
CPrim2D* m_pPrim2D;2D Primitive/Line drawing class.
CGOBToolTip* m_pToolTipWidget;Tool tip widget. This points to user created tool tip widget.
